basic.production: China Yangtzie River Valley and south
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period October-December
basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color yellow green

maintenance.size: Diameter ≥ 20 cm, height can reach 10 m, also cultivated as bonsai
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Apply enough base fertilizers, and apply liquid fertilizer monthly during growing season
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
